language.name: English
item.floristic.floriography.favour.a: Idris gazes upon you with the most warmth passion.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.b: You feel Idris feels a deep affection for you.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.c: You feel Idris sees you as an ally.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.d: You feel Idris views you favourably.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.e: You feel Idris is indifferent to you.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.f: You feel Idris views you unfavourably.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.g: You feel Idris sees you as an enemy.
item.floristic.floriography.favour.h: You feel Idris feels a deep disgust of you.
item.floristic.floriography.transform: At Luna's watch, Idris cultivates me a new stem.
item.floristic.floriography.smite: Idris shall strike mortality upon those defiant to death.
item.floristic.floriography.heal: Irrigate the life of Idris' followers!
